value.verse: The king rejoices in your strength, O LORD; *
value.halfverse: how greatly he exults in your victory!
you have not denied him the request of his lips.
value.verse: You have given him his heartâ€™s desire; *
For you meet him with blessings of prosperity, *
value.halfverse: and set a crown of fine gold upon his head.

value.verse: He asked you for life, and you gave it to him: *
value.halfverse: length of days, for ever and ever.

value.verse: His honor is great, because of your victory; *
value.halfverse: splendor and majesty have you bestowed upon him.
and will make him glad with the joy of your presence.
value.verse: For you will give him everlasting felicity *

value.halfverse: because of the loving-kindness of the Most High, he will not fall.
value.verse: For the king puts his trust in the LORD; *
Your hand will lay hold upon all your enemies; *
value.halfverse: your right hand will seize all those who hate you.

value.verse: You will make them like a fiery furnace *
value.halfverse: at the time of your appearing, O LORD;

value.verse: You will swallow them up in your wrath, *

value.halfverse: and their descendants from among the peoples of the earth.
value.verse: You will destroy their offspring from the land *

Though they intend evil against you
and devise wicked schemes, *

value.halfverse: and aim your arrows at them.
value.verse: For you will put them to flight *

value.halfverse: we will sing and praise your power.
value.verse: Be exalted, O LORD, in your might; *
